name: Minion Destroyed 1000
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Grasshopper to choose a player
ability: Each night*, choose a player, if they are a minion, they die, any good player becomes drunk until dusk

name: Mad Scientist
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Grasshopper to choose a player
ability: Each night, choose a player and you become their alignment

name: Tombraiser
ability: If you are executed, you win and everyone else loses (even if you are dead)

name: Sound slider
otherNightReminder: Wake up sound slider to choose a player
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they cannot speak publicly during the next day or they die
